active_skill.name: Roaring Wheels
active_skill.description:
Rides a motorcycle and pushes the farthest enemy towards the Agent, dealing Physical DMG.

DMG Multiplier:
1440/1536%/1632%/1728%/1824%

Daze Multiplier:
526%/561%/596%/631%/666%

Cooldown 30s

additional_ability.name: Drifting Technique
additional_ability.description: When there are at least 2 Sons of Calydon characters in your squad: Active Skill DMG increases by 36%/45%/54%/63%/72%. After an Active Skill deals DMG to an enemy, when that enemy is defeated, the skill's cooldown is reduced by 4/5/6/7/8s.

chain_attack.name: Mad Charge
chain_attack.description:
Run enemies over with a motorcycle and detonate an explosion, dealing massive Physical DMG.

DMG Multiplier:
1129%/1204%/1280%/1355%/1430%

Daze Multiplier:
162%/172%/183%/194%/205%
